text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Development costs" means costs incurred to construct or rehabilitate a project.

text.section:
"Family of lower income" means a family or individual whose income:
does not exceed the upper income limits that the Secretary establishes under § 4-1505 of this subtitle; and
is lower than the income limits established for families of limited income as provided in § 4-212 of this title.
"Fund" means the Rental Housing Programs Fund under Subtitle 5 of this title.

section.section: "Operating costs" means a cost that a sponsor of a completed project incurs that is necessary to maintain or operate a project.
"Operating costs" includes payments of principal and interest on a loan to cover development costs.

text.section: "Program" means the Rental Housing Production Program.
"Program loan" means a loan that the Department makes under this subtitle.
"Project" means a rental housing production project that meets the qualifications under § 4-1504 of this subtitle.
"Sponsor" means the Department, a political subdivision, or a person that applies for a Program loan.
